faq.response: To apply for admission, you need to register on the REAP portal and follow the counseling schedule.
Candidates must have passed 12th with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics.
Most colleges offer placement assistance through their training and placement cells, with top companies visiting each year.
The tuition fee is â‚¹45,000 per year. Additional hostel and exam fees may apply.
Most colleges provide hostel facilities for both boys and girls with mess and security.
The cutoff marks vary each year. Please visit the official website for the latest details.
You can contact the Department of Technical Education at dte@rajasthan.gov.in or call 0141-XXXXXXX.
The available courses include B.Tech in various branches and Diploma programs in Engineering.
There are various scholarships available for eligible students, including those from the government and private organizations.
Each college offers modern facilities like libraries, labs, sports, and extracurricular activities.
